imdb.plot outline: "Dil ki baatein" is a game show in which film and television's celebrity couples/partners are invited to play interesting games, which involve physical activities and answering question about their romance, understanding and relationship. A famous film actor Faisal Qureshi hosts this show and successful couple gets gifts. A famous film actor Faisal Qureshi hosted this show and successful couple gets gifts.
imdb.title: Dil Ki Baatein
plot: "Dil ki baatein" is a game show in which film and television's celebrity couples/partners are invited to play interesting games, which involve physical activities and answering question about their romance, understanding and relationship. A famous film actor Faisal Qureshi hosts this show and successful couple gets gifts. A famous film actor Faisal Qureshi hosted this show and successful couple gets gifts.::Milly David
